articles.title: Disney acquires $1.5bn stake in Epic Games, is partnering on "games and entertainment universe" in Fortnite - Eurogamer.net

articles.content: The Walt Disney Company has announced it's acquiring a $1.5bn USD stake in Epic Games as it launches a multi-year partnership to create an "expansive and open games and entertainment universe connect… [+2353 chars]
